Question: On June 25, 1985, this person appeared at Avery Fisher Hall in New York City for "A Tribute to John Hammond".
Hints: This person also played three special concerts produced by jazz aficionado and Chicago socialite Helen Oakley.
This person, a wise businessman, helped Henderson in 1929 when the stock market crashed.
Charlie was a hit on the electric guitar and remained in the ____ Sextet for two years (1939–1941).
